::VorbIss::

A stasis pod streaked into the Earth's atmosphere above central Africa. 
Instead of slowing down, though, the abused stasis pod, power cell dwindling 
from meteor punctures, slammed into the jungle canopy with a deafening crash.

For a few moments, all was silent. Then, a voice from the pod blurted out to 
anyone who happened to be listening, "Main stasis chamber power failure. 
Energy at 23%. Attempting to activate protoform."

The stasis pod stuck up a small antenna and, using power as miserly as it was 
able, began a sweep for an acceptable life form for its occupant. Only one 
happened to be close: A weasil, which the pod had landed on the nest of and 
trapped. The weasil chittered angrily at the massive metal hulk above its 
nest, and was replied to with more status reports from the pod.

"Species found. Adapting protoform to life form WEASIL...."

The pod suddenly released a puff of acrid blue smoke, and sparks jumped from 
one end to the other. "Error in solidification", it reported. "Conversion 
from protomatter to proto-nano-bots: 100%. Conversion from proto-nano-bots to 
nano-bot structure drones: 80%. Conversion from nano-bot structure drones to 
robot metallic alloy: 0%."

The stasis pod's computer hummed, buzzed, and shot some sparks. "Main power 
level at 3% and falling." it informed the jungle denizens. "Enacting 
emergency protoform augmentation code to supplement incomplete structural 
system. Computing maximum benefit,,," The computer fizzed some, and one of 
its memory units burst into flames from power core fluid which was spilling 
onto it. The stasis pod beeped ominously, and made a decision. "Optimal 
protoform survival necessitates immediate intelligence. Inserting 
macro-neural algorithmic artificial intelligence module to temporarily 
control protoform." 

The stasis pod's viewport glowed brightly for a moment, as almost a third of 
it's proto-nano-bots were reconfigured to become a computer. With that 
complete, the stasis pod opened itself, and a mass of fluid gunk, supporting 
a small computer with tendrils extending throughout it, and another tendriled 
vacuole holding the protoform's still-unconscious spark, gathered itself from 
the protoform bed and climed out of the stasis pod.

The nano-bot paste, controlled by the computer, oozed about 20 feet before 
collapsing into a puddle, its energy mostly spent. Resting in a small ditch, 
the computer began to think.

[Safety has been achieved. I have achieved safety for this spark. This spark 
must now be activated by me. Me... I? I.. am. I am Iss. Iss must activate 
this spark.] thought the computer. (Author's note: I will put Iss's thoughts 
in square brackets.)

Iss reached one of its tendrils through the nanoprobe body, and stroked the 
spark container, which activated it, and also created a thought-link between 
Iss and the spark.

The spark thought. "I have no body! No senses! No components! Am I dead? Am I 
in the matrix?" [You are not in the matrix, spark.], replied Iss. [What is 
your name?] "I am Vorb", thought the spark. "If I'm not dead, then what's 
wrong with me? I've never experienced this, or even heard of it."

[You nearly did die, Vorb. Your protoform was not completely converted into a 
robot. You consist of nano-bot structure drones and proto-nano-bots. Before 
your failed activation, the stasis pod chose a species for yout beast mode.]

"If I'm made of structure drones, then make a body for me! Robot mode, with 
all the normal stuff, plus a beast mode too, please." thought Vorb.

[Your thought is my command. Be patient, though, for structure drones are 
slow to be adapted outside of a CR chamber or a stasis pod.]

Over the next hour, the puddle lying on the jungle ground lengthened itself 
noticeably. After about two, a basic bi-pedal humanoid form could be 
recognized, but still looking like a slightly melted metal casting of one. By 
five hours, the structure drones had collected and hardened themselves into 
pseudo-robot-parts, and the proto-nano-bots began to change for sensory 
input, simple weapons, and computer access.

Seven hours after Vorb was awakened, the new body opened its eyes. "Finally", 
said Vorb, aloud, through his new mouth. "I am activated."

[Be warey, Vorb] warned Iss. [Your body is not hardened metal alloy like a 
normal robots; it is composed of structure drones. You are very fragile.]

"Fragile, shmagile", thought back Vorb. "I need to find help. Why can't I 
remember anything?"

[Your memory banks were destroyed when the stasis pod landed. To your left, 
you can see what remains of it.]

Vorb walked over to the pod, and plugged into the emergency auxilliary power 
to recharge himself, then grabbed an empty power cell, for filling up later. 
"I must find allies", he thought.

Over his radio, Vorb began to broadcast. "Attention all protoforms. We are 
Vorb and Iss, poly-intelligent robot form. Henceforth we will refer to 
ourself in singular as VorbIss. I require information about what factions 
exist on this planet. Please reply."

------------------------------------
Here's a copy&paste of the VorbIss info page from nbwrpg.com



Gender: Male 
Alliegence Neutral 
Alternate Mode(s): Weasil, Puddle 


Description:

VorbIss is mostly made out of nano-bots. The nanobots form his body, while 
other core functions are done by specialized machinery. All the nanobots are 
capable of doing is changing shape, with the exception of a small supply of 
very specialized information-warfare nanobots. 

VorbIss has a literal split personality, in that in addition to a spark 
container he has a very advanced, and very insane, computer AI. Both of these 
are connected to a nanobot control unit, without which the nanobots are 
unable to function. However, a nanobot puddle will broadcast a homing beacon 
so that it can be found later. A nanobot control unit can control any 
nanobots which it is in physical contact with, so that if VorbIss touches a 
nanobot puddle he immediately gains control of those bots. 

[Example of control unit: 
If you shoot off VorbIss's arm, and the arm doesn't have a control unit in 
it, then it will simply fall to the ground. Over a period of about an hour, 
the nanobots will cease to hold their positions (since they have no 
controller), and the arm will have melted into a small puddle spewing radio 
waves.] 

VorbIss's spark is named Vorb, and the AI is Iss. If VorbIss is split in two 
somehow, and Vorb and Iss are separate, then Iss will act without Vorb. 
However, Iss is (as mentioned above) insane. 

In addition to the spark container and computer, VorbIss has one taser, onem 
edium-powered cutting laser, a small jet engine, and a computer interface. 
These arec ontrolled by nano-bot control units as well, but are not made of 
nano-bots. Any other hardware VorbIss encounters lying around can also be 
picked up and used by his nanobotc controllers as well. 

[Example: 
If you shoot off the arm with the taser, a puddle with a taser in it will be 
the result. 

If VorbIss finds device X, then device X can be integrated into him and be 
controlled and accessed by his nanoprobe controllers. 
] 

VorbIss's nanobots are a deep green, and unable to change color. They are 
also unable to quickly rearrange themselves to change shape, so normally 
instead of being a fluid being VorbIss's nanobots take the shape of standard 
robot components, and harden themselves. 

VorbIss is a relatively fragile bot, because impacts which would not damage a 
regular bot are capable of tearing the nanobot bonds. This means that if you 
swing a sword at him, instead of causing a big dent the sword will cut right 
through him. 

Because Vorb and Iss share the same body. Iss is constantly supplying Vorb 
with weird ideas. Although Iss's motives are volatile and insane, Iss is 
quite intelligent, and can provide very usefull assistence with Vorb's 
guidance. 

VorbIss specializes in computer hacking and information warfare, both of 
which come especially easy to him because Iss is a computer. In addition to 
simply hacking, VorbIss designs and implements hidden data taps and homing 
beacons with the help of a limited supply of specialized nanobots. These 
specialized nanobots are able to maintain simple orders without a control 
unit, allowing his taps and beacons to operate on their own.
